title: Having trouble with new client
body:
Everything was working perfectly for me 12 hours ago, and now when I launch League it's saying there is a problem with my connection, and that if I'm connected to the internet (which I am, streaming as I type) I need to troubleshoot league. It's loaded into the client twice and then suddenly disconnects me again. Anyone else having this issue?

Edit: And it's taking longer than usual to start the launch process. Just got into the client again and then suddenly says there's a problem with my connection. 

Edit 2: A lot of people seem to be having the same issue, so it's a problem on their end! They've acknowledged the issue so  hopefully they'll fix it soon!

replies.body: Riot finally posted something on their page saying they are aware of the issue and working on a fix.

Same issue as of a few minutes ago. I'm clearly still connected to the internet, checked my own connections though to make sure and regardless of how many times I restart the client it's still giving me this message. As soon as the client pops up that connection message accompanies it, so I can't launch through the legacy client, or login, or anything. Going to see if it kicks itself out, if not I might be forced to reinstall and see if that helps. My friend's having the same issue as well.

My fiance and I are having the same issue logging in. Try looking at the league service status page. We tried but it wouldn't connect. If it's doing the same to you, that could confirm it's on Riot's end.
Yeah I also tried to look at the server status and it won't load, maybe they having issues on their end!
I am on the service status page right now, but nothing has been reported yet.  I am having the same issue, but I was already on and was kicked off.  Now I cannot log on.
Nvm on the service status page, its working now. Doesn't mention anything though... :/

There were some server issues overnight that prevent players from logging in on some regions.  Be sure to bookmark the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page to stay up to date on server problems.  Everything should be fine now!

Alright so I found a way that you can do it

PC: 
1. Navigate to toolbar and right click the client icon and click "close window".
2. When league asks you if you want to exit, click no
3. Connection error should go away

Mac:
1. go do your doc and right click league client icon and click quit
2.  When league asks you if you want to exit, click no
3. Connection error should go away

That worked for me
